query: 如图,在Rt△ABC中,D是AB的中点,BC=5,AC=12,则sin∠DCA的值为()选项：['\\frac{5}{12}', '\\frac{5}{13}', '\\frac{13}{12}', '\\frac{12}{13}']
answer:
解:过点D作DE⊥AC于点E,
在Rt△ABC中,AB=√{BC^{2}+AC^{2}}=13,∵点D是AB中点,∴CD=\frac{1}{2}AB=\frac{13}{2},
又∵DE∥BC,∴DE=\frac{1}{2}BC=\frac{5}{2},∴sin∠DCA=\frac{DE}{CD}=\frac{5}{13}．
故选:B．
